name: Defy
summary:
Descend into terror in DEFY, an immersive first-person horror game set within a surreal liminal world. Unspeakable creatures use their raw senses, alongside cutting-edge AI, to hunt you through the ever evolving darkness. Engage in heart-pounding physics-based combat against vicious abominations using brutal melee weapons and powerful firearms. Built exclusively for VR, in DEFY, you must use both your wits and weapons to survive.

It’s your personal odyssey as you embark on a desperate battle towards freedom, against unspeakable monstrosities. CAN YOU SURVIVE?
